sec.p: All fieldwork was conducted using a bird capture permit issued by SEMARNAT, the Secretariat for Environmental Management and Natural Resources of Mexico (Permit number FAUT-0157). We complied with all Mexican and international regulations required for conducting wildlife research in the field including those from IUCN and CITES. No individuals were harmed during data collection, and all individuals were released on the capture location after samples and measurements were taken.
